alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike; Walthall; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 10:37PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern St. Helena, northeastern East Feliciana, northern Tangipahoa and northwestern Washington Parishes, Walthall, Pike, southeastern Wilkinson and Amite Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1037 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Robinwood to 8 miles west of Mccomb to near Woodville. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mccomb, Franklinton, Clinton, Liberty, Greensburg, Magnolia, Kentwood, Summit, Centreville, Tylertown, Woodville, Gloster, Wilson, Osyka, Norwood, Darlington, Mount Herman, Salem, Felps and Dexter. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 54 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
